scripts.codegen:check: $HOME/.cargo/bin/cargo run --manifest-path packages/dda-spec/Cargo.toml --release -- --output packages && git diff --exit-code packages/dda-rs/src/variants.rs packages/dda-py/src/dda_py/variants.py packages/ddalab-tauri/src/types/variants.ts packages/DelayDifferentialAnalysis.jl/src/Variants.jl
scripts.test:dda-py: cd packages/dda-py && python3 -m pytest tests/test_variants.py tests/test_model_encoding.py -v
scripts.test:dda-ts: cd packages/ddalab-tauri && npx vitest run src/types/variants.test.ts
scripts.test:dda-jl: cd packages/DelayDifferentialAnalysis.jl && julia --project=. -e 'using Pkg; Pkg.instantiate(); include("test/runtests.jl")'
scripts.test:dda: npm run test:dda-spec && npm run test:dda-rs && npm run test:dda-py && npm run test:dda-ts && npm run test:dda-jl
scripts.test:dda:parallel: concurrently -n spec,rs,py,ts,jl -c blue,green,yellow,magenta,cyan "npm run test:dda-spec" "npm run test:dda-rs" "npm run test:dda-py" "npm run test:dda-ts" "npm run test:dda-jl"
